name: headliner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the main performer at a concert, festival, etc., whose name is printed at the top of the list of performers and who usually comes on stage last: The festival organizers still haven't announced the headliner for Saturday night. He couldn't seem to break through as a headliner on the comedy circuit.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was the headliner for the Superbowl halftime show.It was after ten o'clock by the time the headliners took the stage.They are the headliners on a world rock tour featuring five different bands.He worked with many famous headliners when they came to Caesar's Palace in the 1960s and 70s.
